title: Everyone Says Sell Your Cannabis Stocks! I See It Differently
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Alan Sumler comes from the world of academia. We discuss his long positions in cannabis and how he approaches his stock analysis. How history influences his cannabis investing and looking at short-term movements through a long-term lens. A rare opinion - Positive on Canada! Playing options, balancing technical and fundamental analysis and problems with the way we cover cannabis investing.
